statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-x^{3} + 3 \, x^{2} - 5 \, x + 4 , -x^{3} - 4 \, x^{2} - 4 \, x - 1 , -6 \, x^{3} - 4 \, x^{2} + 4 , -15 \, x^{3} + 8 \, x^{2} + 22 \, x + 1 , -3 \, x^{3} + 2 \, x^{2} + 5 \, x - 5\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
